mapper.insert: insert into m_userrolemap(roleCode,userID,remark,DeleteFlag, CreateUserId, CreateDate, UpdateUserId, UpdateDate) values(#{roleCode},#{userID},#{remark},'N',#{createUserId},#{createDate},#{updateUserId},#{updateDate})
mapper.update: update m_userrolemap set RoleCode = #{roleCode} where RoleCode = #{oldRoleCode}
